VRDisplayGetPose.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The getPose() method of the interface returns a object defining the future predicted pose of the VRDisplay as it will be when the current frame is actually presented.

blockquote.para: Note: This method was part of the old WebVR API. It has been superseded by the WebXR Device API.
It was even deprecated there — instead, you should use , which also provides a object.
